phrs.translation: 性化, 人化, 使个性化
个性化的演示, 性化的演示
提供个性化服务, 产品
个性化时钟, 个性化的时钟, 个性化设置时钟

sentences.sentence: The mass media tends to personalize politics.
sentences.translation: 大众传媒往往把政治个人化。

sentences.sentence: You can usually also personalize a computer dictionary.
sentences.translation: 你还通常可以根据个人需要设计一个电脑词典。

sentences.sentence: When you sign up, you adopt an animated penguin to chat with friends, play games, explore, collect coins and even personalize your very own igloo.
sentences.translation: 注册时，你就会领养一只活泼的企鹅来与朋友聊天、玩游戏、探索、收集硬币、甚至让你自己的圆顶冰屋个性化。
